message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do a bit better than that, but I need to make a profit. How about $130?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. How about $125?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $115 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you really want the product. I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not going to go too low. How about $135?
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $120 for the product.
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $130, but I'm not going to go any lower. This is my final offer on that price
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.
